colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @025A *, ,'DI NI 'JAM SDUD BZANG GSUM ZHAL 'DON BYED 'DOD 'GA' @025B ZHIG GI BSKUL BA'I NGOR, SKOMS LAS PA DBYANGS CAN DGA' BA'I BLO GROS KYIS DAS PA'I GSUNGS BZHIN 'PHRAL DU BRIS PA'O, ,PAR 'DI BRKO BAR SKYED PA'I DGE BAS KYANG, ,DGE SLONG BLO BZANG MKHAS 'GRUB BRTZON 'GRUS KYIS, ,LTOS BCAS KUN GYI BSAM DON YID BZHIN SGRUB, ,PHYI MAR BDE LDAN ZHING DU BGROD PAR SHOG , ,,
